attributes.action: Recognise that mp's for scottish seats which due to devolution can vote on issues which do not affect their consituents is manifestly unfair and we call on you to introduce legislation to prevent scottish mp;s holding ministerial or prime ministerial office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its just plain wrong that scottish mp's can vote on issues which do not affect their constituents, University tuition fees was an excellent example of this manifestly unfair and undemocratic situation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
